cast.name: 普雷本·克里斯滕森 Preben Kristensen

director.name: 路德维格·克里斯蒂安·内斯特德·波尔森 Ludvig Christian Næsted Poulsen

introduction: An aging man leaves the mainland and his deceased spouse Kristian, in their old house. Hoping to retrieve his spirit, he travels to the island where the couple spent their youth together. While reliving strong memories from their life on the island, the old man makes a series of phone calls to his deceased husband back home. He reflects on his life and wonders whether there is one beyond the love he has experienced.
